Complex directives
==================

.. image:: mylogo.jpeg
   :alt:   My Logo

.. figure:: larch.png

   The larch.

.. note:: This is a paragraph

   - Here is a bullet list.

.. Danger: modify at your own risk!

.. figure:: larch.png
   :scale: 50

   The larch.

.. my_custom_directive:: param1 param2
   :option1: Some content
   :option2: Some content

    Contents,
	  Which are also
	    completely preserved.
